title: The party is a group of drug addicts who have run out of money and must do jobs for their dealer in exchange for their fix. Most wrecking rival drug dealers’ business and stealing whatever stuff they got. Then they are sent to take out a group of scholars researching a medicine to cure their addictions and make them never want their drugs again.
